entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 9:00 AM MDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight then partly cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 9:00 AM MDT Thursday 6 April 2023
